body_html:
This is related to how anaconda manages its environments, and where it places all environment files.
The issue is unrelated to TF itself. The comments by @snnn and @Wendy0601 explain the root cause, and provide a good workaround.
I am closing this issue.

body:
This is related to how anaconda manages its environments, and where it places all environment files.
The issue is unrelated to TF itself. The comments by @snnn and @Wendy0601 explain the root cause, and provide a good workaround.
I am closing this issue.
